title: eq-date-time
description: The EqDateTimeComponent is an Angular component used for rendering a date and time input field with various customization options. It supports view and edit modes, validation, and emits changes to the parent component.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: The current date and time value in ISO format or null.

inputs.name: placeholder
inputs.description: Placeholder text for the input. Defaults to an empty string.

inputs.name: disabled
inputs.description: Whether the input is disabled. Defaults to false.

inputs.name: required
inputs.description: Whether the input is required. Defaults to false.

inputs.name: nullable
inputs.description: Whether the input can be null. Defaults to false.

inputs.name: mode
inputs.description: The mode of the component, either 'view' or 'edit'. Defaults to 'view'.

inputs.name: hint
inputs.description: Hint text for the input. Defaults to an empty string.

inputs.name: size
inputs.description: The size of the input. Defaults to normal.

inputs.name: error
inputs.description: Error message to display when the input is invalid.

inputs.name: usage
inputs.description: Format usage for displaying the date and time. Defaults to 'datetime.medium'.

outputs.name: valueChange
outputs.description: Emits the new date and time value when it changes.
